name: Hyperspace Rangers Runner
description:
An infinite runner for the profit game jam at Philly Game Forge. Made in a few days. Run along a demolished city and fight monsters with sick combos. The winner of this jam is the one who makes the most so if you have some change and you thought this was cool maybe help me out? If not its cool, you're the best for checking this out!

Take a download, it'll look better!
